overview: Sheffield Nolan is the Chief Executive Officer of AppRedeem. Prior to AppRedeem, Sheffield developed multiple iPhone apps that climbed to the top 5 paid and top 5 free spots on the iTunes App Store in multiple countries. Previously he architected and managed large scale solutions for many Fortune 500 companies and venture backed startups, including Visa, eBay, PayPal and AltaVista. In 2004, Sheffield launched the search engine Clush. Sheffield developed a machine learning categorization system for Clush, using probabilistic models for clustering and content classification.
